column5: Room is very clean, private and with a king size real bed. House is spacious and clean. Nicely decorated steps away from restaurants and Vintage Park center (lots of restaurants, stores, music etc)I provide towels, shampoo, conditioner, blow dryer, everything you need in a bathroom. There is a TV room Private bathroom next to the room! its like a little apartment.
column8: Nice room in NW Houston! close to HP campus
